*Create a password:*<br/>
{{{
Password password = ExtendedPassword.createPassword("abid", TimeType.YEAR);
Password password2 = ExtendedPassword.createPassword("abid", "year+year");

//Save password in database
String storePass = password.getPassword();
}}}

*Confirm password:*<br/>
{{{
String dbPassword = "passwordFromDatabase";
Password dynamicPassword = PasswordFactory.getInstance(dbPassword);
boolean result = dynamicPassword.confirmPassword("confirmPassword");
}}}

*Usage:*
{{{
Password password1 = ExtendedPassword.createPassword("abid", TimeType.HOUR);
}}}

This will extend the password based on the hour. So if the time is 13:25, it will add the hour to the password 'abid' and the end result will be 'abid13'.


{{{
Password password1 = ExtendedPassword.createPassword("abid", TimeType.YEAR);
}}}

This will extend the password based on the hour. So if the year is 2009, it will add the year to the password 'abid' and the end result will be 'abid2009'.


{{{
Password password1 = ExtendedPassword.createPassword("abid", "year+month");
}}}

This will extend the password based on the hour. So if the year is 2009 and the month is 4, it will add the year to the month and append it to the password 'abid' and the end result will be 'abid2013'.
